title: My account Lordjime, has been taken, switched to LAN, and haven't heard anything from support.
body: So i haven't played league in two days, went to log into my account, lordjime, and it says it switched regions. So i after trail and error, i found the account has been transferred to Latin America North. So i tried logging into the account, everything is the same, user and pass, but the account is banned, so i can't even transfer regions back to U.S. So i can't post this from my main account, (lordjime). I submitted a support ticket to riot, at 10:45 am today, about 7-8 hours ago, and i haven't heard anything from them. I looked at the email, and none of the links work, also riot is not sending me emails to change my password or anything. I'm kinda at a lack of what to do. The support ticket is (#29819094) i'm not sure if this is to support in LAN or what, but i honestly have no idea what to do. I have never left the US, and been pretty much playing league in the same place for 3 years. This is the first time something like this has happened to me. If there is something i should do, please let me know. -2kg jime. -lordjime

replies.body: I've pulled up your account and I do see where it looks like it could have been compromised, but rest assured that your account will be protected until we can get it back in the right hands. I do see your support ticket in the queue, so you won't need to worry about getting responses in Spanish! Due to the current amount, it's taking a little bit to work through all the tickets, but rest easy knowing that we'll be able to protect your account until it's safely back in your hands.
Thank you so much, you just made my day so much better
I finally managed to change my password, note i don't speak or read Spanish in any way. The fact it is all in spanish isn't helping anything at all either
